Posts.Content: That is fantastic news and thank you for sharing with us! As I am lying here after my second lumpectomy as margins were not clear first time, this just put a smile on my face and a hope that further treatment will make sure it will not come back!  Yeay!
Posts.Title: Cancer free

Posts.Content: I am post menopausal by the way.
Posts.Title: Narrow margin of clear tissue after a breast cancer lumpectomy.

Posts.Content: Hi Chaza and all,  I just had lumpectomy and will need to have another op due too narrow margins. Then radiotherapy and hormone treatment due to my estrogen positive result.  I am reluctant to take hormone tablets for such a long time and wonder if I could avoid it?  Which ones have least se and if there is a alternative medicine possible to take instead?  Any comments and advice much appreciated. Happy Easter to you all!
Posts.Title: Narrow margin of clear tissue after a breast cancer lumpectomy.
